data: {"generalSituation":"The dry northeast monsoon will moderate in the next couple of days. Temperatures will rise over the coast of southern China, but the temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over the inland areas. A broad band of clouds is expected to bring a few rain patches to the coast of Guangdong and the northern part of the South China Sea in the latter part of this week. With the band of clouds thinning out, the weather will improve gradually over the region during the weekend. A replenishment of the northeast monsoon will bring dry and slightly cooler weather to Guangdong early to midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251216","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods at first.
